00200 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00201 
00202 inline InwardConeClusteringAlgorithm::CustomHitOrder::CustomHitOrder()
00203 {
00204     if (1 == m_hitSortingStrategy)
00205     {
00206         pSortFunction = &CustomHitOrder::SortByDensityWeight;
00207     }
00208     else
00209     {
00210         pSortFunction = &CustomHitOrder::SortByEnergy;
00211     }
00212 }
00213 
00214 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00215 
00216 inline bool InwardConeClusteringAlgorithm::CustomHitOrder::operator()(const pandora::CaloHit *lhs, const pandora::CaloHit *rhs) const
00217 {
00218     return (this->*pSortFunction)(lhs, rhs);
00219 }
00220 
00221 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00222 
00223 inline bool InwardConeClusteringAlgorithm::CustomHitOrder::SortByEnergy(const pandora::CaloHit *lhs, const pandora::CaloHit *rhs) const
00224 {
00225     return (!(lhs->GetInputEnergy() > rhs->GetInputEnergy()) && !(rhs->GetInputEnergy() > lhs->GetInputEnergy()) ?
00226         (lhs > rhs) :
00227         (lhs->GetInputEnergy() > rhs->GetInputEnergy()));
00228 }
00229 
00230 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00231 
00232 inline bool InwardConeClusteringAlgorithm::CustomHitOrder::SortByDensityWeight(const pandora::CaloHit *lhs, const pandora::CaloHit *rhs) const
00233 {
00234     return (!(lhs->GetDensityWeight() > rhs->GetDensityWeight()) && !(rhs->GetDensityWeight() > lhs->GetDensityWeight()) ?
00235         (lhs > rhs) :
00236         (lhs->GetDensityWeight() > rhs->GetDensityWeight()));
00237 }

00242 inline pandora::Algorithm *InwardConeClusteringAlgorithm::Factory::CreateAlgorithm() const
00243 {
00244     return new InwardConeClusteringAlgorithm();
00245 }
